data.lyric:
[ti:Put Your Records On]
[ar:Ritt Momney]
[al:Put Your Records On]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Put Your Records On - Ritt Momney (里特·蒙尼)
[00:00.62]Lyrics by：Corinne Bailey Rae
[00:01.25]Composed by：Corinne Bailey Rae
[00:01.88]Three little birds sat on my window
[00:07.14]And they told me I don't need to worry
[00:13.01]Summer came like cinnamon so sweet
[00:17.77]Little girls double-dutch on the concrete
[00:24.04]Maybe sometimes we got it wrong but it's all right
[00:32.81]The more things seem to change the more they stay the same
[00:41.60]Don't you hesitate
[00:43.70]Girl put your records on tell me your favorite song
[00:49.20]You go ahead let your hair down
[00:54.10]Sapphire and faded jeans I hope you get your dreams
[00:59.72]Just go ahead let your hair down
[01:05.21]You're gonna find yourself somewhere somehow
[01:13.78]Blue as the sky sunburnt and lonely
[01:18.83]Sipping tea in the bar by the roadside
[01:21.99]Just relax just relax
[01:24.72]Don't you let those other boys fool you
[01:29.52]Gotta love that afro hairdo
[01:35.82]Maybe sometimes we feel afraid but it's all right
[01:44.75]The more you stay the same the more that they seem to change
[01:53.41]Don't ya think it's strange
[01:58.32]Girl put your records on tell me your favorite song
[02:03.71]You go ahead let your hair down
[02:08.55]Sapphire and faded jeans I hope you get your dreams
[02:14.23]Just go ahead let your hair down
[02:19.71]You're gonna find yourself somewhere somehow
[02:25.47]Just more than I could take pity for pity's sake
[02:31.68]Some nights kept me awake I thought that I was stronger
[02:38.31]When you gonna realize that you don't even have to try any longer
[02:47.88]Do what you want to
[02:50.82]Girl put your records on tell me your favorite song
[02:57.44]Just go ahead let your hair down
[03:03.57]Sapphire and faded jeans I hope you get your dreams
[03:10.18]Just go ahead let your hair down
[03:16.70]You're gonna find yourself somewhere somehow
data.trans:
[ti:Put Your Records On]
[ar:Ritt Momney]
[al:Put Your Records On]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.62]//
[00:01.25]//
[00:01.88]三只小鸟 停在我的窗边
[00:07.14]他们向我呢喃 告诉我不要哭泣
[00:13.01]夏天会如约而至 火热甜蜜
[00:17.77]小女孩在水泥地上跳着绳
[00:24.04]也许有时候 我们也会颠倒黑白 但没关系
[00:32.81]看起来正在改变 或许就是保持不变
[00:41.60]不要犹豫
[00:43.70]女孩 放起音乐 告诉我你最爱的那首歌
[00:49.20]马上唱起来 放开你的长发
[00:54.10]穿着褪色蓝色牛仔裤的女孩们 我希望你能追寻到你的梦想
[00:59.72]继续前行 放下你高扎的马尾
[01:05.21]在某一瞬间 你会在某处找到真正的自己 
[01:13.78]天空湛蓝 享受日光 自在随性
[01:18.83]在街边茶馆啜饮好茶
[01:21.99]放轻松 只需要放松
[01:24.72]不要再上那些男孩的当
[01:29.52]去梳那款你喜欢的非洲卷发
[01:35.82]也许有些时候 我们会感到害怕 但是总会走到坦途
[01:44.75]或许保持不变 就是正在改变
[01:53.41]不要认为这有点奇怪
[01:58.32]女孩 放起音乐 告诉我你最爱的那首歌
[02:03.71]马上唱起来 放开你的长发
[02:08.55]穿着褪色蓝色牛仔裤的女孩们 我希望你能追寻到你的梦想
[02:14.23]继续前行 放下你高扎的马尾
[02:19.71]在某一瞬间 你会在某处找到真正的自己 
[02:25.47]那些让人难以承受的 就顾影自怜一下 就让它过去
[02:31.68]在那些难以入眠的夜晚 我想我是否变得更强
[02:38.31]当你真正领悟了人生 你就不会再试图变得更加坚强
[02:47.88]做你想做的事
[02:50.82]女孩 放起音乐 告诉我你最爱的那首歌
[02:57.44]继续前行 放下你高扎的马尾
[03:03.57]穿着褪色蓝色牛仔裤的女孩们 我希望你能追寻到你的梦想
[03:10.18]继续前行 放下你高扎的马尾
[03:16.70]在某一瞬间 你会在某处找到真正的自己
